column1: Krasnodar Urban Okrug is an urban okrug in Krasnodar Krai
column2: Russia. It was established in 2004. It includes the administrative territorial entities of Yelizavetinskaya  and Krasnodar. The administrative center is Krasnodar.

column1: Krasnodar is the administrative center of the krai. Within the framework of administrative divisions

column5: the City of Krasnodar is incorporated as Krasnodar Urban Okrug.
